panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together
panels.title: CPU Busy

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (5 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (5m avg)

panels.description: Busy state of all CPU cores together (15 min average)
panels.title: Sys Load (15m avg)

targets.expr: max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) / max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{container_label_network=~"$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) * 100

panels.description: Cumulative time that the container consumed on all CPU cores
panels.title: CPU Usage

targets.expr: max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) / max(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) by (name) * 100

sum by (name) ((container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""} / container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{container_label_network="$network", hostname="$hostname", name=~"$container", name!="", image!=""}) * 100)

panels.description: Total time duration the container has been throttled
panels.title: Total CPU Throttled Time

panels.description: Cumulative count of container memory allocation failures
panels.title: Total Memory Failures

panels.description: Number of memory usage hits limits
panels.title: Memory Fail Count

panels.description: Number of I/Os currently in progress in the disk or file system
panels.title: Number of I/Os currently in progress
